passives.name: Unanimity
passives.effects: Gain 20% of your teammate's {{as|attack damage}}, {{as|ability power}}, {{as|'''total''' attack speed}}, {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, {{as|armor}}, {{as|magic resistance}}, and {{as|ability haste}}, increased to 35% if they also have '''Twin Mask''' and are alive.
